verses.roman:
āra dine jagannāthera bhitara-vijaya
rathe caḍi' jagannātha cale nijālaya

synonyms: āra dine—on the next day; jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; bhitara-vijaya—coming out from inside the temple; rathe caḍi'-riding on the car; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; cale—returns; nija-ālaya—to His own home.
translation: The next day Lord Jagannātha came out from the temple and, riding on the car, returned to His own abode.
